channel.title: [PI] ::Item Help
channel.description:
Alright MoparScapeians, I have a probelm. I want the ::item command, but It's not letting me spawn, I went into the commands and got this [code]if (playerCommand.startsWith("item") && (c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Trolled") || c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("") || (c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("") || c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(""))))[/code] Trolled is my username, did I do something wrong? and If I want more than one person to spawn what do I do?
Please answer without Spam and non-sense.
Huge thanks from Disengage to you.

item.title: [PI] ::Item Help
item.dc:creator: @nearfatality nearfatality
item.description:
@nearfatality wrote:

[quote=“ExtremeX-Scape™, post:12, topic:394743”][quote author=nearfatality link=topic=491927.msg3597337#msg3597337 date=1305241357]

Post you’re entire Commands.java on here. or pastebin.com

http://pastebin.com/tGcJQg5Y
[/quote]
http://pastebin.com/t19Usj8i
You’re welcome,
hah. OverloadX Source.[/quote]

Thanks. shuuush! xD

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] ::Item Help
item.dc:creator: @nearfatality nearfatality
item.description:
@nearfatality wrote:

[quote=“ExtremeX-Scape™, post:8, topic:394743”][quote author=nearfatality link=topic=491927.msg3597311#msg3597311 date=1305239517]

try that.

How do I make it more than one player can do ::item?

But it didn’t work for me :L

PlayerRights > 1 = mod, 2 = admin, 3 = owner.

And it didn’t work daing. My whole item command. See if u see something wrong.

[code]
if (playerCommand.startsWith(“item”) && c.playerRights > 2) || ( { }
try {
String[] args = playerCommand.split(" ");
if (args.length == 3) {
int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(args[1]);
int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(args[2]);
if ((newItemID <= 20000) && (newItemID >= 0)) {
c.getItems().addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount);
} else {
c.sendMessage(“No such item.”);
}
} else {
c.sendMessage(“Use as ::pickup 995 200”);
}
} catch(Exception e) {

			}
		}[/code]

[/quote]
LOL

[code=java] if (playerCommand.startsWith(“item”) && c.playerRights > 2)) {
try {
String[] args = playerCommand.split(" ");
if (args.length == 3) {
int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(args[1]);
int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(args[2]);
if ((newItemID <= 20000) && (newItemID >= 0)) {
c.getItems().addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount);
} else {
c.sendMessage(“No such item.”);
}
} else {
c.sendMessage(“Use as ::pickup 995 200”);
}
} catch(Exception e) {

			}
		}[/code][/quote]

2 errors:

[code]src\server\model\players\packets\Commands.java:356: illegal start of expression
if (playerCommand.startsWith(“item”) && c.playerRights >
2)) {

^
src\server\model\players\packets\Commands.java:805: reached end of file while pa
rsing
}→
^
2 errors
Press any key to continue . . .[/code]

Read full topic
